text: Anata gata wa omoiokosanai no ka. Arrā wa ten ni ari-chi ni aru subete no mono o, anata gata no-yō no tame ni kyō sa se, mata sotodzura to naimen no onkei o hatasa retade wanai ka. Daga hitobito no nakaniha, chishiki mo michibiki mo naku, mata kōmyō no keiten mo naku, arrā ni tsuite rongi suru mono ga aru
